message.content:
cs.IT, cs.DS, cs.LG, cs.SI, cs.SY. 

The paper deals with the problem of identifying defective members in a large population using group testing with probabilistic tests. This problem is related to information theory (cs.IT) as it involves designing efficient sampling and reconstruction algorithms. The paper also discusses the use of nonadaptive sampling procedures, which is a topic in data structures (cs.DS). The design of efficient algorithms for group testing is a problem in machine learning (cs.LG) and statistics (cs.SI). Finally, the application of the proposed method to detecting infected people in viral epidemics is related to systems and control (cs.SY).
